Parameters: Element: Element type for inputs and outputs
create(android.support.v8.renderscript.R.Description: Create an intrinsic for applying a blur to an allocation. The default radius is 5.0. Supported elements types are @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Element#U8_E@, @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Element#U8_4_E@.

setInput(android.support.v8.renderscript.Description: Set the input of the blur. Must match the element type supplied during create.

getFieldID_Input().Description: Get a FieldID for the input field of this intrinsic.

Parameters: Allocation: Output allocation. Must match creation element type.
forEach(android.support.v8.renderscript..Description: Apply the filter to the input and save to the specified allocation.

getKernelID().Description: Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.

Parameters: float: The radius of the blur
setRadius(float).Description: Set the radius of the Blur. Supported range 0 < radius <= 25

ClassDesc: Intrinsic Gausian blur filter. Applies a gaussian blur of the specified radius to all elements of an allocation.
